content: (o mariyaame nyaan thottakkaaran thanne enna pole)

Kartthaavine nijadhu-patthaale
Preenippichon sau-rabhyasaman
Edanu naathhane mo-dippichon
Gandhatharudyaana-tthinu thulyan;
/tramyan harmmyasaman;- unnathanil vaanu
/tmooshaathan sabhayil- koodaaram polaam
Athyunnathanaam dai-vatthe than
Bhooshanamettam tho-shippichu.
